attributes.action: Stop Welsh Baccalaureate as it's ruining our education
attributes.background: Welsh Bacc has been the main focus for the past 2 years. By doing Welsh Bacc it has taken us out of our subjects that are more important to us. Many of my friends are struggling in their subjects due to welsh Bacc being in the way, to the point of them worrying that they won't get into 6th form.

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.  

The Welsh Assembly has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Assembly, you can find out more here:

http://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
